author: barnabemonnot
content: sure! added it to the note and also linked to the notebook source. if you go from p = 2.5% per 10M to 2% per 10M, it gives you a lower miner fee (see note: https://notes.ethereum.org/@barnabe/rk5ue1WF_)

author: brad.decker
content: <@!415548822983278593> and/or <@!543900561460822016> do you have any reading material or latest answer on the question of how transactions with same nonce would be handled. It is my understanding that right now there is a minimum threshold of gasPrice increase that must be met for a tx with same nonce to be considered.
